original: Ljunggren, Nils Joel, fil. mag., läroverksadjunkt, Linköping, f. 6/2/91 i Hästveda, Krist. 1., av C. L. o. Nilla Nilsdotter. G. 19 m. Elsa Barring. Barn: Sven f. 21, chef f. ABA resebyrå i Gbg, Olle 21, gymn :dir., Gbg. — Stud:ex. i Malmö 10, fil. kand. i Lund 14, fil. mag. 14, provår 18-19. Res. t. Tyskl., Österr., Engl. o. Frankr. E. lär. i Uddevalla 14, vik. lektor i Jönköp. 15, lär. v. Mariannelunds prakt. sk. 16, vik. adj. i Kalmar 16-17, v. Sthlms samgymn. 17-18, v. Osby isamsk. 19-25, vik. adj. o. vik. lektor v. Luleå h. a. 1. 25-28, vik. adj. i Härnösand 28-31, adj. i modersm. o. latin v. Linköp. h. a. 1. sed. 31.
translated: Ljunggren, Nils Joel, M.A., high school teacher, Linköping, b. 6/2/91 in Hästveda, Kristianstad County, son of C. L. and Nilla Nilsdotter. Married in 19xx to Elsa Barring. Children: Sven b. 21, managing director of ABA travel agency in Gothenburg, Olle b. 21, gymnastics director in Gothenburg. Academic qualifications: Secondary school graduate in Malmö in 1910, Bachelor of Arts in Lund in 1914, Master of Arts in 1914, probationary period in 1918-1919. Resided in Germany, Austria, England, and France. Worked as a teacher in Uddevalla in 1914, substitute lecturer in Jönköping in 1915, teacher at Mariannelund practical school in 1916, substitute adjunct in Kalmar in 1916-1917, at Sthlms samgymn. in 1917-1918, at Osby isamsk. in 1919-1925, substitute adjunct and substitute lecturer at Luleå high school from 1925-1928, substitute adjunct in Härnösand from 1928-1931, adjunct in mother tongue and Latin at Linköping high school since 1931.
